workflow.task:
&SCRIPT_DIR;/wrapper.ksh precip_ncep_db &WF_LOG_DIR;/precip_ncep_db_@Y@m@d@H.log
&SERVICE_OPTS; &YMDH86400;

LINES 34
MODELS RAP_OPERvStageIV/realtime
SQLMODELS
RAP_OPER
GRIDS 03km 13km 20km 40km 80km
